data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Can Alaves capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Alaves take a 0-1 lead thanks to Lucas Perez.
Edgar Mendez with an assist there.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 8, Levante are caught offside.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Tomas Pina is booked for the away team.
In the minute 10, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante just outside Alaves's area.
Levante's Enis Bardhi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alaves have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Levante push upfield but Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 15, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Throw-in Alaves.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Alaves a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Alaves.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Levante throw-in in Alaves's half.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 22, Levante surge into the attack at Ciutat de Valencia but Gonzalo Meleroâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Alaves at Ciutat de Valencia.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 24, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Ciutat de Valencia, Edgar Mendez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Levante's Mickael Malsa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Alaves defender.
In the minute 25, Levante to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Alaves.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Alaves push forward at Ciutat de Valencia and Lucas Perez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Levante defence.
At Ciutat de Valencia, Levante are penalized for being offside.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Alaves.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 34, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Levante throw-in in Alaves's half.
Edgar Mendez (Alaves) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Levante close to the penalty box.
In the minute 36, Carlos Clerc of Levante gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Levante's Jose Luis Morales breaks free at Ciutat de Valencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Levante's Ruben Rochina misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Alaves at Ciutat de Valencia.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 44, Free kick Levante.
Corner awarded to Levante.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Ciutat de Valencia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 47, Levante are whistled for offside.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Can Levante capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Jose Luis Morales.
In the minute 53, Ruben Vezo of Levante smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Levante.
In Valencia Levante attack through Dani Gomez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 56, Alaves make their first substitution with Manu Garcia replacing Tomas Pina.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Alaves throw-in in Levante's half.
In the minute 58, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows against Levante's Enis Bardhi for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Alaves.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 63, Jose Campana is on a sub for Mickael Malsa for Levante.
Jorge De Frutos Sebastian is replacing Ruben Rochina for the home team.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 64, Oscar Duarte (Levante) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Oscar Duarte (Levante) strikes at Ciutat de Valencia but his header is cleared.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Alaves.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a second substitution, with Borja Sainz replacing Lucas Perez.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Alaves a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Levante to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Levante are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 74, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Alaves throw-in in Levante's half.
The home team replace Dani Gomez with Sergio Leon.
Free kick Alaves.
In the minute 76, Alaves's Joselu gets in a shot on goal at Ciutat de Valencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Levante.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Alaves.
Rodrigo Battaglia (Alaves) has received a yellow card from Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 80, Levante have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Rioja for Alaves has been booked by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, In Valencia, Enis Bardhi of Levante is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Gonzalo Melero's header is off-target for Levante.
In the minute 83, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Alaves a goal kick.
Javi Lopez is replacing Luis Rioja for the away team.
In Valencia, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Joselu with Deyverson.
Alaves's Fernando Pacheco has been booked in Valencia.
Levante's Son is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Levante.
Alaves have a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Enis Bardhi with Nemanja Radoja. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paco Lopez.
In the minute 87, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Levante's area.
Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 89, Jose Campana (Levante) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Alaves.
At Ciutat de Valencia the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In Valencia Alaves attack through Deyverson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Levante throw-in in Alaves's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Carlos Clerc (Levante) has received a yellow card from Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
